wikipedia_page.main: Archibald Watson Wright (23 November 1924 – 30 April 1990) was a Scottish footballer, who played as an inside forward. He played for Hamilton Academical, Clyde, Falkirk, Blackburn Rovers, Grimsby Town and Accrington Stanley.Wright was signed for a small fee by then Grimsby Town manager Bill Shankly in 1953.He later became manager of Airdrieonians, and was in charge there as of December 1964.
